doc.title: Klaus Rifbjergs verden
doc.plot: He is a tower of four decades of culture. His works are admired and despised, hated and critically aclaimed. A television crew has followed Klaus Rifbjerg for half a year in 1999 to capture the author, his private life, the publisher, the hunter, the friend, and the life cheater. The documentary is not exactly a portrait, but deals with the stuff literature is made of.
